title: Top Floor Remodeled NOPA 1bd w/ HW Floors! Great Location! ~ J.Wavro

posting_body: ['San Francisco - Alamo Square/NOPA - Apartment for rent', 'Top Floor Remodeled NOPA 1bd w/ HW Floors!', 'Great Location!', 'Link to mobile layout: \xa0 <URL>', 'Summary:', 'Rent: $2895', 'Bed / Bath: 1 / 1', 'Type: Apartment', 'Term: 1 Year', 'Please contact:', 'Kent Boeker \xa0 |', 'show contact info', '| \xa0 \xa0 <URL>', 'Description:', 'This remodeled apartment is located in trendy NOPA/Alamo Square.', "\xa0A Walkers Paradise - you will love grabbing breakfast at Brenda's or Eddie's Cafe, grocery shopping at Bi-Right or heading to the Divisadero Farmers Market!", '\xa0Alamo Square Park is only a few blocks away.', '\xa0 Conveniently located near the Shuttle stops.', '\xa0 Excellent Transit score!', '\xa0You will love living here!', 'Features the following:', '~ \xa0Rent controlled', '~\xa0 Top floor apartment in a small 3 story walk-up building', '~ \xa0Western exposure', '~\xa0 Approximately 725sqft', '~ \xa0Hardwood floors, tiled bath', '~\xa0 Remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances featuring a gas stove', '~\xa0 Large living room with French Doors that open to the bedroom', '~\xa0 Bedroom with closet', '~ \xa0Remodeled bath with vanity sink and shower/tub combo', '~\xa0 Additional large closet in hallway', '~ \xa0Water and garbage included', '~\xa0 Garage parking for additional fee', '~\xa0 No laundry on site - laundromat nearby', '~\xa0 Cat friendly', 'This is a non-smoking unit.', 'Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.', 'Details:', 'Floors: Hardwood', 'Kitchen: Remodeled', 'Laundry: Laundromat nearby', 'Outside area: None', 'Parking: Garage', 'Parking Fee: $300', 'Pets:   Cat    OK', 'View: Neighborhood', 'Location:', 'Broderick Street & Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, California', 'Meet the J.Wavro Team:', '<URL>', 'Please contact:', 'Kent Boeker \xa0 |', 'show contact info', '| \xa0 \xa0 <URL>', 'Preview more properties at <URL>', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'Content and Images © 2003 -
